评论详情: This backpack is so beautiful and it is highly functional.  It is my go-to for traveling now.  I absolutely love and recommend it!
This backpack is perfect! There is so much room and it is gorgeous! The quality is great! Planning on getting another in a different color!
It was packaged like a *new* item but arrived with someone else's personal items still in it, including their prescription medicine.
Cada que viajo con mi mochila!
I love everything about this backpack.  The quilted black is very elegant.  Lots of space and pockets.  Good quality too.
Love this backpack 🎒! It's very pretty, and I get lots of compliments. Better yet, it's so very roomy!! More than a regular backpack. Great value and very sturdy.
Amazing bag. I have the carry on bag too and both bags are amazing. Have to test out the durability and let y’all know but it has lots of compartment. Perfect for travel.

This backpack is not only beautiful, but spacious, lots of pockets and organization compartments, I’m using it for travel instead of a huge bag. Very comfortable to carry and a showoff. Will get more as xmas gifts, very cheap in price but looks and feels expensive.
Love this, seems sturdy and love the quilting on it and attention to detail.

very high quality! big enough for my laptop, ipad, and all my school supplies. i like that there is enough padding to protect my valuable item and it's very lightweight itself! i got it in black and it's also perfect for when i have to take a bunch of stuff to court!!

I’m disappointed in how heavy this bag is compared to others. By the time you add your laptop and items, it’s very heavy. Also I thought anti theft meant it would have a lock not just clipping of zipper pulls.  I needed it so I had to use it and not return it.
I was worried about the color, but it wipes clean very easily. Spot cleans easily and my daughter loves the way it looks and feels. Would buy again!
The product met my expectations. I love it.
